parameter.name: cloudscrapsstorage-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: cloudscrapsstorage Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Server = tcp:cloudscrapsdbserver.database.windows.net,1433;Initial Catalog = CloudScraps_db; Persist Security Info=False;User ID = CloudMan; Password=CMPG323@Me; MultipleActiveResultSets=False;Encrypt=True;TrustServerCertificate=False;Connection Timeout = 30
